[03] 167^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V3.0217^ea^ kho pana samayena jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhāto navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivattho allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya bhagavato avidūre ekamantaṃ ṭhito hoti.

[03] addasā kho bhagavā jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhātaṃ navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivatthaṃ allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. disvāna jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiṃ nu tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhāto navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivattho allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya ekamantaṃ ṭhito? kiṃ nvajja brāhmaṇakulassā''ti? ``paccorohaṇī, bho gotama, ajja brāhmaṇakulassā''ti ^a^P5.0250^ea^.

[03] ``yathā kathaṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hotī''ti? ``idha, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhātā navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivatthā allena gomayena pathaviṃ opuñjitvā haritehi kusehi pattharitvā antarā ca velaṃ antarā ca agyāgāraṃ seyyaṃ kappenti. te taṃ rattiṃ tikkhattuṃ ^a^T5.0268^ea^ paccuṭṭhāya pañjalikā aggiṃ namassanti -- `paccorohāma bhavantaṃ, paccorohāma bhavanta'nti. bahukena ca sappitelanavanītena aggiṃ santappenti. tassā ca rattiyā accayena paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena brāhmaṇe santappenti. evaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hotī''ti.

[03] ``aññathā kho, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hoti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī''ti. ``yathā kathaṃ ^a^M3.0460^ea^ pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hoti? sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^V3.0218^ea^ hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bho''ti kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavā etadavoca --
[03] ``idha, brāhmaṇa, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati -- `pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā' ti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya pāṇātipātaṃ pajahati; pāṇātipātā paccorohati.
[03] ...adinnādānassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya adinnādānaṃ pajahati; adinnādānā paccorohati.
[03] ...kāmesumicchācārassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya kāmesumicchācāraṃ pajahati; kāmesumicchācārā paccorohati.
[03] ..ṃusāvādassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya ^a^P5.0251^ea^ musāvādaṃ pajahati; musāvādā paccorohati.
[03] ...pisuṇāya vācāya kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme ^a^T5.0269^ea^ abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pajahati; pisuṇāya vācāya paccorohati.
[03] ...pharusāya vācāya kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya pharusaṃ vācaṃ pajahati; pharusāya vācāya paccorohati.
[03] ...samphappalāpassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya samphappalāpaṃ pajahati; samphappalāpā paccorohati.
[03] ...abhijjhāya ^a^M3.0461^ea^ kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya abhijjhaṃ pajahati; abhijjhāya paccorohati.
[03] ...byāpādassa ^a^V3.0219^ea^ kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya byāpādaṃ pajahati; byāpādā paccorohati.

[03] ..ṃicchādiṭṭhiyā kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā'ti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati; micchādiṭṭhiyā paccorohati. evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī''ti.

[01] ``aññathā kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hoti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hoti. imissā, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇiyā brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasiṃ. abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama...pe0... upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata''nti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, paccorohaṇiṃ desessāmi. taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ ^a^T5.0270^ea^. bhagavā etadavoca --

[03] ``katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyā paccorohaṇī? idha ^a^P5.0252^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati -- `pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā'ti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya pāṇātipātaṃ pajahati; pāṇātipātā paccorohati.
[03] ... `adinnādānassa kho pāpako vipāko -- diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā'ti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya adinnādānaṃ pajahati; adinnādānā paccorohati.
[03] ... ^a^V3.0220^ea^ `kāmesumicchācārassa kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... kāmesumicchācārā paccorohati.
[03] ... `musāvādassa ^a^M3.0462^ea^ kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... musāvādā paccorohati.
[03] ... `pisuṇāya vācāya kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... pisuṇāya vācāya paccorohati.
[03] ... `pharusāya vācāya kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... pharusāya vācāya paccorohati.
[03] ... `samphappalāpassa kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... samphappalāpā paccorohati.
[03] ... `abhijjhāya kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... abhijjhāya paccorohati.
[03] ... `byāpādassa kho pāpako vipāko...pe0... ^a^T5.0271^ea^ byāpādā paccorohati.

[03] ``katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyā paccorohaṇī? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati -- `micchādiṭṭhiyā kho pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā'ti. so iti paṭisaṅkhāya micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati; micchādiṭṭhiyā paccorohati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyā paccorohaṇī''ti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.117} atha ^a^V3.0221^ea^ kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca --

[03] ``kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, orimaṃ tīraṃ, kiṃ pārimaṃ tīra''nti? ``pāṇātipāto kho, brāhmaṇa, orimaṃ tīraṃ, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. adinnādānaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, orimaṃ tīraṃ, adinnādānā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. kāmesumicchācāro orimaṃ tīraṃ, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. musāvādo orimaṃ tīraṃ, musāvādā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. pisuṇā vācā orimaṃ tīraṃ, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. pharusā vācā orimaṃ tīraṃ, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. samphappalāpo orimaṃ tīraṃ, samphappalāpā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. abhijjhā orimaṃ tīraṃ, anabhijjhā pārimaṃ tīraṃ. byāpādo orimaṃ tīraṃ, abyāpādo pārimaṃ tīraṃ. micchādiṭṭhi orimaṃ tīraṃ, sammādiṭṭhi pārimaṃ tīraṃ. idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, orimaṃ tīraṃ, idaṃ pārimaṃ tīranti.
[21] ``appakā ^a^M3.0463^ea^ ^a^P5.0253^ea^ te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino.
[22] athāyaṃ ^a^T5.0272^ea^ itarā pajā, tīramevānudhāvati..
[21] ``ye ca kho sammadakkhāte, dhamme dhammānuvattino.
[22] te janā pāramessanti, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ..
[21] ``kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito.
[22] okā anokamāgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ..
[21] ``tatrābhiratimiccheyya, hitvā kāme akiñcano.
[22] pariyodapeyya attānaṃ, cittaklesehi paṇḍito..
[21] ``yesaṃ ^a^V3.0222^ea^ sambodhiyaṅgesu, sammā cittaṃ subhāvitaṃ.
[27] ādānapaṭinissagge, anupādāya ye ratā.
[22] khīṇāsavā jutimanto, te loke parinibbutā''ti.. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``orimañca, bhikkhave, tīraṃ desessāmi pārimañca tīraṃ. taṃ suṇātha...pe0... katamañca, bhikkhave, orimaṃ tīraṃ, katamañca pārimaṃ tīraṃ? pāṇātipāto, bhikkhave, orimaṃ tīraṃ, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. adinnādānaṃ orimaṃ tīraṃ, adinnādānā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. kāmesumicchācāro orimaṃ tīraṃ, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. musāvādo orimaṃ tīraṃ, musāvādā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. pisuṇā vācā orimaṃ tīraṃ, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. pharusā vācā orimaṃ tīraṃ, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. samphappalāpo orimaṃ tīraṃ, samphappalāpā veramaṇī pārimaṃ tīraṃ. abhijjhā orimaṃ tīraṃ, anabhijjhā pārimaṃ tīraṃ. byāpādo orimaṃ tīraṃ, abyāpādo pārimaṃ ^a^T5.0273^ea^ tīraṃ. micchādiṭṭhi orimaṃ tīraṃ, sammādiṭṭhi pārimaṃ tīraṃ. idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, orimaṃ tīraṃ, idaṃ pārimaṃ tīranti.
[21] ``appakā ^a^P5.0254^ea^ te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino.
[22] athāyaṃ itarā pajā, tīramevānudhāvati..
[21] ``ye ca kho sammadakkhāte, dhamme dhammānuvattino.
[22] te janā pāramessanti, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ..
[21] ``kaṇhaṃ ^a^M3.0464^ea^ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito.
[22] okā anokamāgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ..
[21] ``tatrābhiratimiccheyya, hitvā kāme akiñcano.
[22] pariyodapeyya attānaṃ, cittaklesehi paṇḍito..
[21] ``yesaṃ ^a^V3.0223^ea^ sambodhiyaṅgesu, sammā cittaṃ subhāvitaṃ.
[27] ādānapaṭinissagge, anupādāya ye ratā.
[22] khīṇāsavā jutimanto, te loke parinibbutā''ti.. catutthaṃ.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.113} ``adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo anattho ca; dhammo ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca viditvā anatthañca, dhammañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca? pāṇātipāto, adinnādānaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro, musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhammo ^a^T5.0274^ea^ ca anattho ca.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca? pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhi -- ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca.

[03] ```adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo anattho ca; dhammo ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca viditvā anatthañca, dhammañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta''nti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``adhammo ^a^P5.0255^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo ^a^M3.0465^ea^ yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabba''nti. idamavoca bhagavā. idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0224^ea^ kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- ``idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā''ti?

[03] atha ^a^T5.0275^ea^ kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi -- ``ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ. pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ. yaṃnūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyāma. yathā no āyasmā mahākaccāno byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavocuṃ --

[03] ``idaṃ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca ^a^P5.0256^ea^ viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti.

[03] ``tesaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- adhammo ca, bhikkhave...pe0... tathā ^a^T5.0276^ea^ paṭipajjitabbanti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena ^a^M3.0466^ea^ uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā'ti?

[03] ``tesaṃ ^a^V3.0225^ea^ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ etadahosi -- `ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ. pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ. yaṃnūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma. yathā no āyasmā mahākaccāno byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā'ti. vibhajatu āyasmā mahākaccāno''ti.

[03] ``seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāraṃ gavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkamma khandhaṃ sākhāpalāse sāraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ maññeyya. evaṃsampadamidaṃ āyasmantānaṃ satthari sammukhībhūte taṃ bhagavantaṃ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ maññatha {maññetha (sī0), maññeyyātha (ka0)}. so hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato. so ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ tumhe bhagavantaṃyeva ^a^P5.0257^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha. yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā''ti.

[03] ``addhā, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa ^a^T5.0277^ea^ dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato. so ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ mayaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma. yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāma. api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ. pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ. vibhajatāyasmā mahākaccāno agaruṃ karitvā''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^M3.0467^ea^ hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, āvuso''ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṃ. athāyasmā mahākaccāno etadavoca --

[03] ``yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā ^a^V3.0226^ea^ uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti.

[03] ``katamo, cāvuso, adhammo; katamo ca dhammo? katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho? ``pāṇātipāto, āvuso, adhammo; pāṇātipātā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca pāṇātipātapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; pāṇātipātā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``adinnādānaṃ, āvuso, adhammo; adinnādānā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca adinnādānapaccayā aneke ^a^P5.0258^ea^ pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti ^a^T5.0278^ea^, ayaṃ anattho; adinnādānā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``kāmesumicchācāro, āvuso, adhammo; kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca kāmesumicchācārapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``musāvādo, āvuso, adhammo; musāvādā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca musāvādapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; musāvādā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``pisuṇā vācā, āvuso, adhammo; pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca pisuṇāvācāpaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``pharusā ^a^M3.0468^ea^ vācā, āvuso, adhammo; pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca pharusāvācāpaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; pharusāya vācāya veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``samphappalāpo ^a^V3.0227^ea^, āvuso, adhammo; samphappalāpā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca samphappalāpapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; samphappalāpā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ ^a^T5.0279^ea^ attho.

[03] ``abhijjhā, āvuso, adhammo; anabhijjhā dhammo; ye ca abhijjhāpaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; anabhijjhāpaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``byāpādo, āvuso, adhammo; abyāpādo dhammo; ye ca byāpādapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; abyāpādapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhi, āvuso, adhammo; sammādiṭṭhi dhammo; ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ```yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ ^a^P5.0259^ea^ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti. imassa kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi. ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe, āvuso, bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha. yathā no bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā''ti.

[03] ``evamāvuso''ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu ^a^M3.0469^ea^; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ ^a^T5.0280^ea^ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ --

[03] ``yaṃ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā ^a^V3.0228^ea^ vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti.

[03] ``tesaṃ no, bhante, amhākaṃ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā'ti?

[03] ``tesaṃ no, bhante, amhākaṃ etadahosi -- `ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ. pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa ^a^P5.0260^ea^ vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ. yaṃnūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma. yathā no āyasmā mahākaccāno byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā'ti.

[03] ``atha kho mayaṃ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno ^a^T5.0281^ea^ tenupasaṅkamimhā; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ apucchimhā. tesaṃ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi akkharehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho suvibhatto''ti.

[01] ``sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave! paṇḍito, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno. mahāpañño, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno. maṃ cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi cetaṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākataṃ. eso ceva tassa attho. evañca naṃ dhāreyyāthā''ti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``adhammo ^a^M3.0470^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca ^a^V3.0229^ea^. adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo; katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho? pāṇātipāto, bhikkhave, adhammo; pāṇātipātā veramaṇī dhammo; ye ca pāṇātipātapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; pāṇātipātā veramaṇipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ``adinnādānaṃ, bhikkhave, adhammo; adinnādānā veramaṇī dhammo... kāmesumicchācāro, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0261^ea^, adhammo; kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī dhammo... musāvādo, bhikkhave, adhammo; musāvādā veramaṇī dhammo... pisuṇā vācā, bhikkhave, adhammo; pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī dhammo... pharusā vācā, bhikkhave, adhammo; pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī dhammo... samphappalāpo, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0282^ea^, adhammo; samphappalāpā veramaṇī dhammo... abhijjhā, bhikkhave, adhammo; anabhijjhā dhammo... byāpādo, bhikkhave, adhammo; abyāpādo dhammo....

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhi, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammādiṭṭhi dhammo; ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho; sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.

[03] ```adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabba'nti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta''nti. sattamaṃ.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``pāṇātipātampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``adinnādānampāhaṃ ^a^M3.0471^ea^ ^a^V3.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``kāmesumicchācārampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``musāvādampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``pisuṇavācampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``pharusavācampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``samphappalāpampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``abhijjhampāhaṃ ^a^P5.0262^ea^, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``byāpādampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0283^ea^, tividhaṃ vadāmi -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi. iti kho, bhikkhave, lobho kammanidānasambhavo, doso kammanidānasambhavo, moho kammanidānasambhavo. lobhakkhayā kammanidānasaṅkhayo, dosakkhayā kammanidānasaṅkhayo, mohakkhayā kammanidānasaṅkhayo''ti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``saparikkamano ^a^V3.0231^ea^ ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano. kathañca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano? pāṇātipātissa, bhikkhave, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. adinnādāyissa, bhikkhave, adinnādānā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. kāmesumicchācārissa, bhikkhave, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. musāvādissa, bhikkhave, musāvādā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. pisuṇavācassa ^a^M3.0472^ea^, bhikkhave, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. pharusavācassa, bhikkhave, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. samphappalāpissa, bhikkhave, samphappalāpā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti. abhijjhālussa, bhikkhave, anabhijjhā parikkamanaṃ hoti. byāpannacittassa {byāpādassa (sī0 pī0 ka0), byāpannassa (syā0)}, bhikkhave, abyāpādo parikkamanaṃ hoti. micchādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi parikkamanaṃ hoti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano''ti. navamaṃ.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ ^a^P5.0263^ea^ samayaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ {campāyaṃ (ka0 sī0) dī0 ni0 2.189 passitabbaṃ} viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane. atha kho cundo kammāraputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ ^a^T5.0284^ea^ nisinnaṃ kho cundaṃ kammāraputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca -- ``kassa no tvaṃ, cunda, soceyyāni rocesī''ti? ``brāhmaṇā, bhante, pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā {sevālamālakā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti; tesāhaṃ soceyyāni rocemī''ti.

[03] ``yathā kathaṃ pana, cunda, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapentī''ti? ``idha, bhante, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā. te sāvakaṃ {sāvake (syā0 ka0)} evaṃ samādapenti -- `ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, kālasseva {sakālasseva (syā0)} uṭṭhahantova {uṭṭhahanto (syā0), vuṭṭhahantova (pī0 ka0)} sayanamhā pathaviṃ āmaseyyāsi; no ce pathaviṃ āmaseyyāsi, allāni gomayāni āmaseyyāsi; no ce allāni ^a^V3.0232^ea^ gomayāni āmaseyyāsi, haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyāsi; no ce haritāni tiṇāni āmaseyyāsi, aggiṃ paricareyyāsi; no ce aggiṃ paricareyyāsi, pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namasseyyāsi; no ce pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namasseyyāsi, sāyatatiyakaṃ udakaṃ oroheyyāsī'ti. evaṃ kho, bhante, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā ^a^M3.0473^ea^ kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti; tesāhaṃ soceyyāni rocemī''ti.

[03] ``aññathā kho, cunda, brāhmaṇā pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udakorohakā soceyyāni paññapenti, aññathā ca pana ^a^P5.0264^ea^ ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṃ hotī''ti. ``yathā kathaṃ pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṃ hoti? sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye soceyyaṃ hotī''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, cunda, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi ^a^T5.0285^ea^ karohi; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bhante''ti kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavā etadavoca --
[03] ``tividhaṃ kho, cunda, kāyena asoceyyaṃ hoti; catubbidhaṃ vācāya asoceyyaṃ hoti; tividhaṃ manasā asoceyyaṃ hoti.
[03] ``kathañca, cunda, tividhaṃ kāyena asoceyyaṃ hoti? ``idha, cunda, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtesu {pāṇabhūtesu (ka0)}.
[03] ``adinnādāyī hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.

[03] ``kāmesumicchācārī hoti. yā tā māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā {natthi sī0 syā0 pī0 potthakesu} bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā {natthi sī0 syā0 pī0 potthakesu} dhammarakkhitā sasāmikā saparidaṇḍā antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi, tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti. evaṃ kho, cunda, tividhaṃ kāyena asoceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^V3.0233^ea^, cunda, catubbidhaṃ vācāya asoceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco musāvādī hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho -- `ehambho ^a^M3.0474^ea^ purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti {so ajānaṃ vā ahaṃ jānāmīti, jānaṃ vā ahaṃ na jānāmīti, apassaṃ vā ahaṃ passāmīti, passaṃ vā ahaṃ na passāmīti (pī0 ka0) evamuparipi}, so ajānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti; apassaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti {so ajānaṃ vā ahaṃ jānāmīti, jānaṃ vā ahaṃ na jānāmīti, apassaṃ vā ahaṃ passāmīti, passaṃ vā ahaṃ na passāmīti (pī0 ka0) evamuparipi}. iti attahetu ^a^P5.0265^ea^ vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇavāco hoti. ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā imesaṃ ^a^T5.0286^ea^ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti samaggānaṃ vā bhettā {bhedātā (ka0)}, bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātā, vaggārāmo vaggarato vagganandī vaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusavāco hoti. yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī; anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ. evaṃ kho, cunda, catubbidhaṃ vācāya asoceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, cunda, tividhaṃ manasā asoceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ abhijjhātā {abhijjhitā (ka0) ma0 ni0 1.440 passitabbaṃ} hoti -- `aho vata yaṃ parassa taṃ mamassā'ti.
[03] ``byāpannacitto hoti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu'nti {mā vā ahesuṃ iti vā ti (sī0 pī0 ka0)}.

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano -- `natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ {natthettha pāṭhabhedo} kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye ^a^V3.0234^ea^ imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. evaṃ kho, cunda, manasā tividhaṃ asoceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``ime ^a^M3.0475^ea^ ^a^P5.0266^ea^ kho, cunda, dasa akusalakammapathā {akusalā kammapathā (?)}. imehi kho, cunda, dasahi akusalehi kammapathehi samannāgato kālasseva uṭṭhahantova ^a^T5.0287^ea^ sayanamhā pathaviṃ cepi āmasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi pathaviṃ āmasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``allāni cepi gomayāni āmasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi allāni gomayāni āmasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``haritāni cepi tiṇāni āmasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi haritāni tiṇāni āmasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``aggiṃ cepi paricarati, asuciyeva hoti, no cepi aggiṃ paricarati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``pañjaliko cepi ādiccaṃ namassati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namassati, asuciyeva hoti.

[03] ``sāyatatiyakaṃ cepi udakaṃ orohati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi sāyatatiyakaṃ udakaṃ orohati, asuciyeva hoti. taṃ kissa hetu? ime, cunda, dasa akusalakammapathā asucīyeva {asucicceva (syā0)} honti asucikaraṇā ca.

[03] ``imesaṃ pana, cunda, dasannaṃ akusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ samannāgamanahetu nirayo paññāyati, tiracchānayoni paññāyati, pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā {yā ca (ka0)} panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo {duggati hoti (syā0 ka0)}.
[03] ``tividhaṃ kho, cunda, kāyena soceyyaṃ hoti; catubbidhaṃ vācāya soceyyaṃ hoti; tividhaṃ manasā soceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``kathaṃ ^a^V3.0235^ea^, cunda, tividhaṃ kāyena soceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.

[03] ``adinnādānaṃ ^a^M3.0476^ea^ pahāya, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā, na taṃ adinnaṃ {taṃ nādinnaṃ (ka0 sī0, ma0 ni0 1.441)} theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.

[03] ``kāmesumicchācāraṃ pahāya, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato ^a^T5.0288^ea^ hoti yā tā māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sasāmikā saparidaṇḍā antamaso ^a^P5.0267^ea^ mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi, tathārūpāsu na cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti. evaṃ kho, cunda, tividhaṃ kāyena soceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, cunda, catubbidhaṃ vācāya soceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho -- `ehambho purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, apassaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti. iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāya, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti -- na ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, na amutra vā sutvā imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā sahitānaṃ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti. yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``samphappalāpaṃ ^a^V3.0236^ea^ pahāya, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī; nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ. evaṃ kho, cunda ^a^T5.0289^ea^, catubbidhaṃ vācāya soceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^M3.0477^ea^, cunda, tividhaṃ manasā soceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ anabhijjhitā hoti -- `aho vata yaṃ parassa taṃ mamassā'ti.
[03] ``abyāpannacitto hoti appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā averā hontu {idaṃ padaṃ sī0 syā0 pī0 potthakesu natthi, tathā ma0 ni0 1.441} abyāpajjā, anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū'ti.

[03] ``sammādiṭṭhiko hoti ^a^P5.0268^ea^ aviparītadassano -- `atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. evaṃ kho, cunda, tividhaṃ manasā soceyyaṃ hoti.

[03] ``ime kho, cunda, dasa kusalakammapathā. imehi kho, cunda, dasahi kusalehi kammapathehi samannāgato kālasseva uṭṭhahantova sayanamhā pathaviṃ cepi āmasati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi pathaviṃ āmasati, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``allāni cepi gomayāni āmasati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi allāni gomayāni āmasati, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``haritāni cepi tiṇāni āmasati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi haritāni tiṇāni āmasati, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``aggiṃ ^a^V3.0237^ea^ cepi paricarati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi aggiṃ paricarati, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``pañjaliko cepi ādiccaṃ namassati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namassati ^a^T5.0290^ea^, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``sāyatatiyakaṃ cepi udakaṃ orohati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi sāyatatiyakaṃ udakaṃ orohati, suciyeva hoti. taṃ kissa hetu? ime, cunda, dasa kusalakammapathā sucīyeva honti sucikaraṇā ca.

[03] ``imesaṃ ^a^M3.0478^ea^ pana, cunda, dasannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ samannāgamanahetu devā paññāyanti, manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo''ti {sugati hotīti (syā0), sugati hoti (ka0)}.
[03] evaṃ vutte cundo kammāraputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaṃ, bhante...pe0... upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata''nti. dasamaṃ.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P5.0269^ea^ kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca --

[03] ``mayamassu, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāma. dānāni dema, saddhāni karoma -- `idaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappatu, idaṃ dānaṃ petā ñātisālohitā paribhuñjantū'ti. kacci taṃ, bho gotama, dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappati; kacci te petā ñātisālohitā taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantī''ti? ``ṭhāne kho, brāhmaṇa, upakappati, no aṭṭhāne''ti.

[03] ``katamaṃ ^a^V3.0238^ea^ pana, bho {katamañca pana bho (sī0 pī0) katamaṃ (syā0)} gotama, ṭhānaṃ, katamaṃ aṭṭhāna''nti? ``idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇavāco hoti, pharusavāco hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhiko ^a^T5.0291^ea^ hoti. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjati. yo nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. idampi {idaṃ (syā0)} kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī...pe0... micchādiṭṭhiko hoti. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjati. yo tiracchānayonikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena ^a^M3.0479^ea^ so tattha tiṭṭhati. idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya ^a^P5.0270^ea^ paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yo manussānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhiko hoti. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yo devānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. idampi, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ yattha ṭhitassa ^a^T5.0292^ea^ taṃ dānaṃ upakappati.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti...pe0... micchādiṭṭhiko hoti. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjati. yo pettivesayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati, yaṃ vā panassa ito anuppavecchanti mittāmaccā ^a^V3.0239^ea^ vā ñātisālohitā vā {mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā (sī0 pī0)}, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṃ yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ upakappatī''ti.

[03] ``sace pana, bho gotama, so peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti, ko taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjatī''ti? ``aññepissa, brāhmaṇa, petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ upapannā honti, te taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantī''ti.

[03] ``sace pana, bho gotama, so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti aññepissa ñātisālohitā petā taṃ ^a^M3.0480^ea^ ṭhānaṃ anupapannā honti, ko taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjatī''ti? ``aṭṭhānaṃ kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vivittaṃ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṃ petehi ^a^P5.0271^ea^ ñātisālohitehi. api ca, brāhmaṇa, dāyakopi anipphalo''ti.

[03] ``aṭṭhānepi bhavaṃ gotamo parikappaṃ vadatī''ti? ``aṭṭhānepi kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, parikappaṃ vadāmi. idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇavāco hoti, pharusavāco hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhiko hoti; so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ ^a^T5.0293^ea^ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hatthīnaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. so tattha lābhī hoti annassa pānassa mālānānālaṅkārassa {mālāgandhavilepanassa nānālaṅkārassa (ka0)}.

[03] ``yaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, idha pāṇātipātī adinnādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hatthīnaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tena so tattha lābhī hoti annassa pānassa mālānānālaṅkārassa.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti...pe0... micchādiṭṭhiko hoti. so dātā ^a^V3.0240^ea^ hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā assānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati...pe0... gunnaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati...pe0... kukkurānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati {``kukkurānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī''ti ayaṃ vāro kesuci sīhaḷapotthakesu na dissatīti iṅgalisapotthake adholipi. taṃ dasavāragaṇanāya sameti}. so tattha lābhī hoti annassa pānassa mālānānālaṅkārassa.

[03] ``yaṃ ^a^M3.0481^ea^ kho, brāhmaṇa, idha pāṇātipātī...pe0 ^a^P5.0272^ea^ ... micchādiṭṭhiko, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā kukkurānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yañca kho ^a^T5.0294^ea^ so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tena so tattha lābhī hoti annassa pānassa mālānānālaṅkārassa.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhiko hoti. so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. so tattha lābhī hoti mānusakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ.

[03] ``yaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhiko, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tena so tattha lābhī hoti mānusakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ.

[03] ``idha pana, brāhmaṇa ^a^T5.0295^ea^, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhiko hoti. so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. so tattha lābhī ^a^P5.0273^ea^ hoti dibbānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ.

[03] ``yaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhiko, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tena ^a^V3.0241^ea^ so tattha lābhī hoti dibbānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ. api ca, brāhmaṇa, dāyakopi anipphalo''ti.

[03] ``acchariyaṃ, bho gotama, abbhutaṃ, bho gotama! yāvañcidaṃ, bho gotama, alameva dānāni dātuṃ, alaṃ saddhāni kātuṃ, yatra hi nāma dāyakopi ^a^M3.0482^ea^ anipphalo''ti. ``evametaṃ, brāhmaṇa {evametaṃ brāhmaṇa evametaṃ brāhmaṇa (sī0 syā0)}, dāyakopi hi, brāhmaṇa, anipphalo''ti.

[03] ``katamañca, bhikkhave, asādhu? pāṇātipāto, adinnādānaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro, musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asādhu.

[03] ``katamañca, bhikkhave, sādhu? pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhi -- idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sādhū''ti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇavāco hoti, pharusavāco ^a^T5.0303^ea^ hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato ^a^P5.0282^ea^ hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo''.

[03] 200-209^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na bhajitabbo...pe0... bhajitabbo... na payirupāsitabbo... payirupāsitabbo... na pujjo hoti... pujjo hoti... na pāsaṃso hoti... pāsaṃso hoti... agāravo hoti... gāravo hoti... appatisso hoti... sappatisso hoti... na ārādhako hoti... ārādhako hoti... na visujjhati... visujjhati... mānaṃ nādhibhoti {nābhibhoti (sī0) a0 ni0 10.156-166} ... mānaṃ adhibhoti... paññāya na vaḍḍhati... paññāya vaḍḍhati...pe0....

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^M3.0489^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavati... bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti ^a^V3.0251^ea^, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti ^a^T5.0304^ea^, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatī''ti.
[06] aparapuggalavaggo pañcamo.
[06] catutthapaṇṇāsakaṃ samattaṃ.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^T5.0307^ea^ ^a^M3.0490^ea^ ^a^V3.0252^ea^ ^a^P5.0283^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtesu {natthettha pāṭhabhedo}.
[03] ``adinnādāyī hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā, taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.

[03] ``kāmesu micchācārī hoti. yā tā māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sasāmikā saparidaṇḍā antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi, tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti.

[03] ``musāvādī hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho -- `ehambho purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti, apassaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti. iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇavāco hoti -- ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti samaggānaṃ vā bhettā bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātā vaggārāmo ^a^T5.0306^ea^ vaggarato vagganandī, vaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusavāco ^a^V3.0253^ea^ hoti -- yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``samphappalāpī ^a^M3.0491^ea^ hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
[03] ``abhijjhālu ^a^P5.0284^ea^ hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ abhijjhātā hoti -- `aho vata yaṃ parassa taṃ mama assā'ti.
[03] ``byāpannacitto hoti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu'nti.

[03] ``micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano -- `natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
[03] ``adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā, na ^a^T5.0307^ea^ taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.
[03] ``kāmesumicchācāraṃ pahāya kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti. yā tā māturakkhitā...pe0... antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi, tathārūpāsu na cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti.

[03] ``musāvādaṃ ^a^V3.0254^ea^ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho -- `ehambho purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, apassaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti. iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā ^a^P5.0285^ea^ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇavācaṃ ^a^M3.0492^ea^ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti -- na ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā sahitānaṃ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī, samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusavācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti. yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``samphappalāpaṃ pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti kālavādī bhūtavādī, atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī, nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ.
[03] ``anabhijjhālu hoti ^a^T5.0308^ea^. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ anabhijjhātā hoti -- `aho vata yaṃ parassa taṃ mama assā'ti.
[03] ``abyāpannacitto hoti appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā averā hontu abyāpajjā anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū'ti.

[01] ``sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano -- `atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ^a^V3.0255^ea^ ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtesu.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0256^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātī ^a^P5.0287^ea^ hoti...pe0... adinnādāyī hoti... kāmesumicchācārī hoti... musāvādī hoti... pisuṇavāco hoti... pharusavāco hoti... samphappalāpī hoti... abhijjhālu hoti... byāpannacitto hoti... micchādiṭṭhiko hoti.... imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0257^ea^ ^a^P5.0288^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā avisāradā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātinī hoti... adinnādāyinī hoti... kāmesumicchācārinī hoti... musāvādinī hoti... pisuṇāvācā hoti... pharusavācā hoti... samphappalāpinī hoti... abhijjhālunī hoti... byāpannacittā hoti... micchādiṭṭhikā hoti.... imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā avisāradā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā visāradā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā hoti... adinnādānā paṭiviratā hoti... kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā hoti... musāvādā paṭiviratā hoti... pisuṇāya vācāya paṭiviratā hoti... pharusāya vācāya paṭiviratā hoti... samphappalāpā paṭiviratā hoti... anabhijjhālunī hoti... abyāpannacittā hoti... sammādiṭṭhikā hoti.... imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā visāradā agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī''ti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``saṃsappanīyapariyāyaṃ ^a^M3.0495^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmi. taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ. bhagavā etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, saṃsappanīyapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo? kammassakā, bhikkhave, sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā, yaṃ kammaṃ karonti -- kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā -- tassa dāyādā bhavanti.

[03] ``idha ^a^P5.0289^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī ^a^T5.0310^ea^ hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho, adayāpanno ^a^V3.0258^ea^ sabbapāṇabhūtesu. so saṃsappati kāyena, saṃsappati vācāya, saṃsappati manasā. tassa jimhaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti, jimhaṃ vacīkammaṃ, jimhaṃ manokammaṃ, jimhā gati, jimhupapatti.

[03] ``jimhagatikassa kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jimhupapattikassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi -- ye vā ekantadukkhā nirayā yā vā saṃsappajātikā tiracchānayoni. katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, saṃsappajātikā tiracchānayoni? ahi vicchikā satapadī nakulā biḷārā mūsikā ulūkā, ye vā panaññepi keci tiracchānayonikā sattā manusse disvā saṃsappanti. iti kho, bhikkhave, bhūtā bhūtassa upapatti hoti. yaṃ karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamenaṃ phassā phusanti. evamahaṃ, bhikkhave, `kammadāyādā sattā'ti vadāmi.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adinnādāyī hoti...pe0... kāmesumicchācārī hoti... musāvādī hoti... pisuṇavāco hoti... pharusavāco hoti... samphappalāpī hoti... abhijjhālu hoti... byāpannacitto hoti... micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano -- `natthi dinnaṃ...pe0... sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. so saṃsappati kāyena, saṃsappati vācāya, saṃsappati manasā. tassa jimhaṃ kāyakammaṃ ^a^T5.0311^ea^ hoti, jimhaṃ vacīkammaṃ, jimhaṃ manokammaṃ, jimhā gati, jimhupapatti ^a^P5.0290^ea^.

[03] ``jimhagatikassa kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jimhupapattikassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi -- ye vā ekantadukkhā nirayā yā vā saṃsappajātikā tiracchānayoni. katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, saṃsappajātikā tiracchānayoni ^a^M3.0496^ea^? ahi vicchikā satapadī nakulā biḷārā mūsikā ulūkā, ye vā panaññepi keci tiracchānayonikā sattā manusse disvā saṃsappanti. iti kho, bhikkhave, bhūtā bhūtassa upapatti hoti, yaṃ karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamenaṃ phassā phusanti. evamahaṃ, bhikkhave, `kammadāyādā sattā'ti vadāmi. kammassakā, bhikkhave, sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā, yaṃ kammaṃ karonti -- kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā -- tassa dāyādā bhavanti.

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo ^a^V3.0259^ea^ nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati. so na saṃsappati kāyena, na saṃsappati vācāya, na saṃsappati manasā. tassa uju kāyakammaṃ hoti, uju vacīkammaṃ, uju manokammaṃ, uju gati, ujupapatti.

[03] ``ujugatikassa kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ujupapattikassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi -- ye vā ekantasukhā saggā yāni vā pana tāni uccākulāni khattiyamahāsālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulāni vā gahapatimahāsālakulāni vā aḍḍhāni mahaddhanāni mahābhogāni pahūtajātarūparajatāni pahūtavittūpakaraṇāni pahūtadhanadhaññāni. iti kho, bhikkhave, bhūtā bhūtassa ^a^T5.0312^ea^ upapatti hoti. yaṃ karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamenaṃ phassā phusanti. evamahaṃ, bhikkhave, `kammadāyādā sattā'ti vadāmi.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti... musāvādaṃ ^a^P5.0291^ea^ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti... pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti... pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti... samphappalāpaṃ pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti... anabhijjhālu hoti... abyāpannacitto hoti... sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano -- `atthi dinnaṃ...pe0... ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. so na saṃsappati kāyena, na saṃsappati vācāya, na saṃsappati manasā. tassa uju kāyakammaṃ hoti, uju vacīkammaṃ, uju manokammaṃ, uju gati, ujupapatti.

[03] ``ujugatikassa ^a^M3.0497^ea^ kho pana ahaṃ, bhikkhave, ujupapattikassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi -- ye vā ekantasukhā saggā yāni vā pana tāni uccākulāni khattiyamahāsālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulāni vā gahapatimahāsālakulāni vā aḍḍhāni mahaddhanāni mahābhogāni pahūtajātarūparajatāni pahūtavittūpakaraṇāni pahūtadhanadhaññāni. iti kho, bhikkhave, bhūtā bhūtassa ^a^T5.0313^ea^ upapatti hoti. yaṃ karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamenaṃ phassā phusanti. evamahaṃ, bhikkhave, `kammadāyādā sattā'ti vadāmi.

[03] ``kammassakā ^a^V3.0260^ea^, bhikkhave, sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā, yaṃ kammaṃ karonti -- kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā -- tassa dāyādā bhavanti. ayaṃ kho so, bhikkhave, saṃsappanīyapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo''ti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``nāhaṃ ^a^P5.0292^ea^, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā {appaṭisaṃviditvā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi. tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā {upapajjaṃ vā (ka0) a0 ni0 6.63 passitabbaṃ, upapajja vā (ma0 ni0 3.303)} apare vā pariyāye. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā {akusalaṃ sañcetanikaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ (ka0)} hoti; catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti; tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtesu.
[03] ``adinnādāyī ^a^M3.0498^ea^ hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā, taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.

[03] ``kāmesumicchācārī hoti. yā tā māturakkhitā...pe0... antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi ^a^T5.0314^ea^, tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā ^a^V3.0261^ea^ dukkhavipākā hoti? idha ^a^P5.0293^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco musāvādī hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho `ehambho purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti, apassaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti, iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇavāco hoti. ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti samaggānaṃ vā bhettā bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātā vaggārāmo vaggarato vagganandī, vaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusavāco hoti. yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā. asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^T5.0315^ea^, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ, taṃ abhijjhātā hoti -- `aho vata, yaṃ parassa taṃ mama assā'ti.
[03] ``byāpannacitto ^a^M3.0499^ea^ hoti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu'nti.

[03] micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano -- `natthi dinnaṃ...pe0 ^a^P5.0294^ea^... ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ ^a^V3.0262^ea^ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``tividha kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu {... sañcetanikahetu (ka0)} vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti; tividhamanokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.

[03] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃkhitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti ^a^T5.0316^ea^; evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhakāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti; tividhamanokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantīti.

[03] ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti; catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti; tividhā manokammantasampatti ^a^P5.0295^ea^ kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^M3.0500^ea^, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā ^a^V3.0263^ea^ hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati...pe0....
[03] ``adinnādānaṃ pahāya, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ gāmagataṃ vā araññagataṃ vā, na taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.

[03] ``kāmesumicchācāraṃ pahāya, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti. yā tā māturakkhitā ^a^T5.0317^ea^ ...pe0... antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittāpi, tathārūpāsu na cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti. sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho `ehambho purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī'ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha `na jānāmī'ti, jānaṃ vā āha `jānāmī'ti, apassaṃ vā āha `na passāmī'ti, passaṃ vā āha `passāmī'ti, iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāya, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti -- na ito sutvā amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā na imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya. iti bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā ^a^P5.0296^ea^ sahitānaṃ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandiṃ, samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
[03] ``pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti. yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] ``samphappalāpaṃ ^a^V3.0264^ea^ pahāya, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī, nidhānavatiṃ ^a^T5.0318^ea^ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti kālena ^a^M3.0501^ea^ sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ anabhijjhātā hoti -- `aho vata, yaṃ parassa taṃ mamassā'ti.
[03] ``abyāpannacitto hoti appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo -- `ime sattā averā hontu abyāpajjā anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū'ti.

[03] ``sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano -- `atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ...pe0... ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī'ti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``tividhakāyakammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; tividhamanokammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.

[03] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃkhitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti; evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhakāyakammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu ^a^P5.0297^ea^ vā sattā ^a^T5.0319^ea^ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; tividhamanokammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ ^a^V3.0265^ea^ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi. tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmī''ti. sattamaṃ. {aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aṭṭhamasuttampi ettheva pariyāpannaṃ viya saṃvaṇṇanā dissati}

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``nāhaṃ ^a^M3.0502^ea^, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti; catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti; tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ ^a^P5.0298^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā ^a^T5.0320^ea^ hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasandosabyāpatti akusalasañcetanikā dukkhudrayā dukkhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye ^a^M3.0503^ea^. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā kāyakammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^T5.0321^ea^, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catubbidhā vacīkammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti ^a^P5.0299^ea^.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tividhā manokammantasampatti kusalasañcetanikā sukhudrayā sukhavipākā hoti.

[03] ``tividhakāyakammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti; catubbidhavacīkammantasampatti...pe0... tividhamanokammantasampattikusalasañcetanikāhetu ^a^V3.0267^ea^ vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti...pe0.... {upapajjanti. (syā0 ka0) tathā sati ``nāhaṃ bhikkhave sañcetanikāna'' miccādinā vuccamānavacanena saha ekasuttanti gahetabbaṃ. peyyālena pana purimasutte viya nigamanaṃ dassitaṃ} aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye. na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃveditvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ vadāmi.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako evaṃ vigatābhijjho vigatabyāpādo asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissato mettāsahagatena cetasā ^a^M3.0504^ea^ ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ {catutthiṃ (?)}. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena ^a^T5.0322^ea^ appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

[03] ``so evaṃ pajānāti -- `pubbe kho me idaṃ cittaṃ parittaṃ ahosi abhāvitaṃ, etarahi pana me idaṃ cittaṃ appamāṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ. yaṃ kho pana kiñci pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ, na taṃ tatrāvasissati na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī'ti ^a^P5.0300^ea^.
[03] ``taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, daharatagge ce so ayaṃ {ce ayaṃ (syā0)} kumāro mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveyya, api nu kho {api nu so (?)} pāpakammaṃ kareyyā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante''.
[03] ``akarontaṃ kho pana pāpakammaṃ api nu kho dukkhaṃ phuseyyā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante. akarontañhi, bhante, pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī''ti!

[03] ``bhāvetabbā kho panāyaṃ, bhikkhave, mettācetovimutti itthiyā vā purisena vā. itthiyā vā, bhikkhave, purisassa vā nāyaṃ kāyo ādāya gamanīyo. cittantaro ayaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0268^ea^, macco. so evaṃ pajānāti -- `yaṃ kho me idaṃ kiñci pubbe iminā karajakāyena pāpakammaṃ kataṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ idha vedanīyaṃ; na taṃ anugaṃ bhavissatī'ti. evaṃ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, mettā cetovimutti anāgāmitāya saṃvattati, idha paññassa bhikkhuno uttari {uttariṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} vimuttiṃ appaṭivijjhato.

[03] ``karuṇāsahagatena cetasā... muditāsahagatena cetasā... upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ tathā catutthaṃ. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.

[03] ``so evaṃ pajānāti -- `pubbe kho me idaṃ cittaṃ parittaṃ ahosi abhāvitaṃ, etarahi pana me idaṃ cittaṃ appamāṇaṃ ^a^T5.0323^ea^ subhāvitaṃ. yaṃ kho pana kiñci pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ ^a^P5.0301^ea^, na taṃ tatrāvasissati na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī'ti.
[03] ``taṃ ^a^M3.0505^ea^ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, daharatagge ce so ayaṃ kumāro upekkhaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveyya, api nu kho pāpakammaṃ kareyyā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante''.
[03] ``akarontaṃ kho pana pāpakammaṃ api nu kho dukkhaṃ phuseyyā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante. akarontañhi, bhante, pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī''ti!

[03] ``bhāvetabbā kho panāyaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā cetovimutti itthiyā vā purisena vā. itthiyā vā, bhikkhave, purisassa vā nāyaṃ kāyo ādāya gamanīyo. cittantaro ayaṃ, bhikkhave, macco. so evaṃ pajānāti -- `yaṃ kho me idaṃ kiñci pubbe iminā karajakāyena pāpakammaṃ kataṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ idha vedanīyaṃ; na taṃ anugaṃ bhavissatī'ti. evaṃ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, upekkhā cetovimutti anāgāmitāya saṃvattati, idha paññassa bhikkhuno uttari vimuttiṃ appaṭivijjhato''ti. navamaṃ.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 2.16} atha ^a^V3.0269^ea^ kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yenamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī''ti? ``adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī''ti.

[03] ``ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo ^a^T5.0324^ea^ yenamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā ^a^P5.0302^ea^ paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī''ti? ``dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī''ti.

[03] ``na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi. sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathāhaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyya''nti. ``tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi ^a^M3.0506^ea^; bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bho''ti kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavā etadavoca --
[03] ``tividhā ^a^T5.0325^ea^ kho, brāhmaṇa, kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti; catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti; tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
[03] ``kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyā visamacariyā hoti.
[03] ``kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyā visamacariyā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^V3.0270^ea^, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti. evaṃ adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
[03] ``tividhā brāhmaṇa, kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti; catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti; tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
[03] ``kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ ^a^P5.0303^ea^ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
[03] ``kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti...pe0... evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti. evaṃ dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī''ti.
[03] ``abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama...pe0... upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata''nti. dasamaṃ.
[06] karajakāyavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0271^ea^ ^a^M3.0507^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇavāco hoti, pharusavāco hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato ^a^T5.0326^ea^ yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] ``dasahi ^a^P5.0304^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi dasahi? pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``vīsatiyā, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi vīsatiyā? attanā ca pāṇātipātī hoti, parañca pāṇātipāte samādapeti; attanā ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārī hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācāre samādapeti; attanā ca musāvādī hoti, parañca musāvāde samādapeti; attanā ca pisuṇavāco hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya samādapeti; attanā ca pharusavāco hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya samādapeti; attanā ca samphappalāpī hoti, parañca samphappalāpe samādapeti; attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti; attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti; attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, vīsatiyā dhammehi ^a^T5.0327^ea^ samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] ``vīsatiyā ^a^V3.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi vīsatiyā? attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti ^a^M3.0508^ea^, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, parañca musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca ^a^P5.0305^ea^ pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, parañca samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā samādapeti; attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti; attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti; attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, vīsatiyā dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``tiṃsāya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi tiṃsāya? attanā ca pāṇātipātī hoti, parañca pāṇātipāte samādapeti, pāṇātipāte ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ^a^T5.0328^ea^ ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti, adinnādāne ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārī hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācāre samādapeti, kāmesumicchācāre ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca musāvādī hoti, parañca musāvāde samādapeti, musāvāde ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca pisuṇavāco hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya samādapeti, pisuṇāya vācāya ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca pharusavāco hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya samādapeti, pharusāya vācāya ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca samphappalāpī hoti, parañca samphappalāpe samādapeti, samphappalāpe ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti, abhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti, byāpāde ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti, micchādiṭṭhiyā ca samanuñño hoti -- imehi kho ^a^M3.0509^ea^, bhikkhave, tiṃsāya dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] ``tiṃsāya ^a^V3.0273^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi tiṃsāya? attanā ^a^P5.0306^ea^ ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ^a^T5.0329^ea^ ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, parañca musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, musāvādā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, parañca samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti, anabhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti, abyāpāde ca samanuñño hoti; attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca samanuñño hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiṃsāya dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``cattārīsāya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi cattārīsāya? attanā ca pāṇātipātī hoti, parañca pāṇātipāte samādapeti, pāṇātipāte ca samanuñño hoti ^a^T5.0330^ea^, pāṇātipātassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti, adinnādāne ca samanuñño hoti, adinnādānassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārī hoti ^a^M3.0510^ea^, parañca kāmesumicchācāre samādapeti, kāmesumicchācāre ^a^P5.0307^ea^ ca samanuñño hoti, kāmesumicchācārassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca musāvādī hoti, parañca musāvāde samādapeti, musāvāde ca samanuñño hoti, musāvādassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca pisuṇavāco hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya samādapeti, pisuṇāya vācāya ca samanuñño hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca pharusavāco hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya samādapeti, pharusāya ^a^V3.0274^ea^ vācāya ca samanuñño hoti, pharusāya vācāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca samphappalāpī hoti, parañca samphappalāpe samādapeti, samphappalāpe ca samanuñño hoti, samphappalāpassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti, abhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti, abhijjhāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti, byāpāde ca samanuñño hoti, byāpādassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti, micchādiṭṭhiyā ca samanuñño hoti, micchādiṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, cattārīsāya dhammehi samannāgato ^a^T5.0331^ea^ yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

[03] ``cattārīsāya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi cattārīsāya? attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, adinnādānā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, parañca musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti, musāvādā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, musāvādā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca pisuṇāya ^a^P5.0308^ea^ vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ^a^M3.0511^ea^ samādapeti, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samādapeti, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, parañca samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā ^a^T5.0332^ea^ samādapeti, samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti, samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti, anabhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti, anabhijjhāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti, abyāpāde ca samanuñño hoti, abyāpādassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati; attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti ^a^V3.0275^ea^, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca samanuñño hoti, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, cattārīsāya dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti.

[03] 229-232^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^T5.0333^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ ^a^P5.0309^ea^ upapajjati...pe0... idhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. vīsatiyā, bhikkhave...pe0... tiṃsāya, bhikkhave,...pe0... cattārīsāya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati...pe0... idhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati''.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ``rāgassa ^a^V3.0276^ea^, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame dasa? asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā -- rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā''ti.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``rāgassa ^a^P5.0310^ea^, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame dasa? aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aṭṭhikasaññā, puḷavakasaññā {pulavakasaññā (sī0) puḷuvakasaññā (ka0)}, vinīlakasaññā, vipubbakasaññā, vicchiddakasaññā, uddhumātakasaññā -- rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā''ti.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ``rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame dasa ^a^T5.0334^ea^? sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi, sammāñāṇaṃ, sammāvimutti -- rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā''ti.
